value: so I think I want to just encourage
everyone that if you're going through a
trying situation maybe you're going
through something right now and maybe
it's not as Extreme as jail but it's
something that you know a situation that
you're not enjoying that's tough maybe
it's something that you're in because
you brought it on yourself because of
poor decisions that you made just know
that you can use the situations for the
good and that he can turn these things
around he can use them to teach you
things that you might not have otherwise
learned and and he is faithful to to
deliver you to rescue you to to bring
you out of wherever you're at so I want
to just encourage any of you that are
going through situations like that that
that yah does open the door of
deliverance and he does he does make a
way out I'm very very grateful for the
friends that I have for the support that
I have very grateful for the people that
I met while I was in jail both fellow
inmates and the chaplain and them and I
just can see the Yas hand even even when
I put myself in a situation that I
probably could have avoided but even
when I put myself in a situation of a
bad situation that yah was faithful to
use it to teach me to love me and to
eventually deliver me and now I'm here
I'm here in Portland Oregon once again
and I'm ready to get back to the
ministry ready to want to start trying
to do at least a podcast for Shabbat and
then a midweek podcast so to podcasts a
week I want to start as soon as i get my
computers shipped to me down from alaska
i'm going to restart or a rather finish
finish the work i started on doing my
audio version of love never fails
continuing to write the sequel deliverer
fails through the fire and then also
working on my novel and and continuing
with the ministry i just ordered about a
thousand website cards that I'm planning
to pass out next weekend at the rose
festival parade which draws 10
thousands of people from not only all
across the nation but all across the
world so there'll be a lot of people
that I'll be able to spread the website
to at that at that parade so thank you
all for your prayers and God bless you
may you have a wonderfully blessed
Shabbat and a wonderful coming week
shabbat shalom
